framework_info.name: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard v4.0
framework_info.description: Security standards for organizations that handle cardholder data

requirement_categories: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for implementing and/or maintaining firewall configurations are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Establish and implement firewall and router configuration standards
controls.category: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems
controls.description: Establish and implement firewall and router configuration standards that include a formal process for approving and testing all network connections and changes to the firewall and router configurations.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify processes are defined for implementing and/or maintaining firewall configurations
Interview personnel to verify processes are implemented as documented
controls.guidance: Firewall and router configurations should be reviewed and approved by authorized personnel. All changes should be documented and tested before implementation.
controls.customization: The entity may customize this requirement to align with their defined processes for implementing and/or maintaining firewall configurations.

controls.title: Configuration standards for firewall and router are defined and implemented
controls.requirement_title: Configure firewall and router security features
controls.category: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems
controls.description: Configuration standards for network security controls are defined and implemented to provide only necessary services, protocols, daemons, etc., as required for the function of the system.
testing_procedures: Examine configuration standards to verify they are defined
Examine firewall and router configurations to verify they are implemented according to the configuration standards
controls.guidance: Configuration standards should specify only necessary services and protocols. Unnecessary services should be disabled or removed.
controls.customization: The entity may customize configuration standards based on their specific technology and business requirements.

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for maintaining vendor default accounts are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Always change vendor-supplied defaults and remove or disable unnecessary default accounts before installing a system on the network
controls.category: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems
controls.description: For all system components, vendor-supplied defaults for system passwords and other security parameters are always changed before installing a system on the network.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify processes are defined for maintaining vendor default accounts
Examine system configurations to verify vendor defaults have been changed
controls.guidance: Default passwords and security parameters are well known and create security vulnerabilities. All defaults should be changed before deployment.
controls.customization: The entity may customize this requirement based on their change management and deployment processes.

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for protecting stored account data are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Keep cardholder data storage to a minimum by implementing data retention and disposal policies, procedures and processes
controls.description: Cardholder data storage is kept to a minimum through implementation of data retention and disposal policies, procedures, and processes that include limiting data storage amount and retention time to that which is required for legal, regulatory, and/or business requirements.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify processes are defined for protecting stored account data
Interview personnel to verify data retention and disposal processes are implemented
controls.guidance: Organizations should minimize the storage of cardholder data and ensure proper disposal when no longer needed for business purposes.
controls.customization: The entity may customize data retention periods based on business, legal, and regulatory requirements.

controls.title: PAN is protected with strong cryptography during transmission over open, public networks
controls.requirement_title: Protect account data during transmission over open, public networks
controls.description: PAN is protected with strong cryptography and security protocols during transmission over open, public networks.
testing_procedures: Examine system configurations to verify strong cryptography is implemented
Examine data transmission processes to verify protection over public networks
controls.guidance: Strong cryptography includes TLS 1.2 or higher for web-based applications and other strong encryption protocols for other applications.
controls.customization: The entity may implement cryptographic methods appropriate for their specific technologies and applications.

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for identifying security vulnerabilities are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Develop and maintain secure systems and applications
controls.description: Processes and mechanisms for identifying security vulnerabilities are defined, documented, and followed.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify processes are defined for identifying security vulnerabilities
Interview personnel to verify vulnerability identification processes are implemented
controls.guidance: Organizations should establish formal processes for identifying vulnerabilities through security advisories, vendor notifications, and security testing.
controls.customization: The entity may customize vulnerability identification processes based on their technology environment and risk assessment.

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for limiting access to system components and cardholder data are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Limit access to system components and cardholder data by business need to know
controls.description: Processes and mechanisms for limiting access to system components and cardholder data by business need-to-know are defined, documented, and implemented.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify processes are defined for limiting access
Interview personnel to verify access control processes are implemented
controls.guidance: Access should be granted based on job function and business need. Principle of least privilege should be applied to all access decisions.
controls.customization: The entity may customize access control processes based on their organizational structure and business requirements.

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for authenticating access to system components are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Define and implement policies and procedures to ensure proper user identification management
controls.description: Processes and mechanisms for authenticating access to system components are defined, documented, and implemented.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify authentication processes are defined
Interview personnel to verify authentication processes are implemented
controls.guidance: Authentication processes should include unique user identification, strong authentication methods, and proper session management.
controls.customization: The entity may customize authentication processes based on their technology environment and risk assessment.

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for logging and monitoring access to network resources and cardholder data are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Implement audit trails to link all access to network resources and cardholder data to each individual user
controls.description: Processes and mechanisms for logging and monitoring access to network resources and cardholder data are defined, documented, and implemented.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify logging and monitoring processes are defined
Interview personnel to verify logging processes are implemented
controls.guidance: Comprehensive logging should capture all access to cardholder data and network resources with sufficient detail to establish accountability.
controls.customization: The entity may customize logging requirements based on their system architecture and regulatory requirements.

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for testing security of network implementations are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Implement a process to test for the presence of wireless access points and detect and identify all authorized and unauthorized wireless access points on a quarterly basis
controls.description: Processes and mechanisms for testing security of network implementations and detecting unauthorized wireless access points are defined, documented, and implemented.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify wireless testing processes are defined
Interview personnel to verify wireless detection processes are implemented
controls.guidance: Regular testing should detect both authorized and unauthorized wireless access points. Testing should be performed quarterly or more frequently.
controls.customization: The entity may customize wireless testing frequency and methods based on their environment and risk assessment.

controls.title: An overall information security policy is established and published
controls.requirement_title: Establish, publish, maintain, and disseminate a security policy
controls.description: An overall information security policy is established, published, maintained, and disseminated to all relevant personnel.
testing_procedures: Examine the information security policy to verify it is established and published
Interview personnel to verify the policy is disseminated and understood
controls.guidance: The information security policy should address all aspects of protecting cardholder data and be reviewed and updated annually.
controls.customization: The entity may customize the information security policy based on their organizational structure and business requirements.

controls.title: Processes and mechanisms for managing service providers are defined and documented
controls.requirement_title: Maintain and implement policies and procedures to manage service providers with whom cardholder data is shared or that could affect the security of cardholder data
controls.description: Processes and mechanisms for managing service providers with access to cardholder data or that could impact cardholder data security are defined, documented, and implemented.
testing_procedures: Examine documented procedures to verify service provider management processes are defined
Interview personnel to verify service provider management processes are implemented
controls.guidance: Service provider management should include due diligence, written agreements, and ongoing monitoring of compliance status.
controls.customization: The entity may customize service provider management based on the types and number of service providers used.

controls.title: An incident response plan exists and can be implemented in the event of suspected or confirmed security incident affecting cardholder data
controls.description: An incident response plan exists and can be implemented in the event of a suspected or confirmed security incident affecting cardholder data.
testing_procedures: Examine the incident response plan to verify it exists and addresses cardholder data incidents
Interview personnel to verify the plan can be implemented when needed
controls.guidance: The incident response plan should include immediate response procedures, escalation processes, and communication protocols for cardholder data incidents.
controls.customization: The entity may customize the incident response plan based on their organizational structure and incident types.
